revised_title: Discovery and Properties of Citromycetin, a New Yellow Colouring Matter
tldr: The author discovers a new yellow colouring matter called citromycetin produced from glucose by species of Citromyces. They study its properties and find it to be specific to the genus Citromyces. The author also investigates the factors affecting its production, such as aeration, iron salts concentration, and the nature of the containing vessel.
